title: ‘We Will Be Even Better than Visma’: Jan Tratnik Sees Big Innovation at Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe
content:
Tratnik and Ryan Mullen enthuse about changes to team, believing squad can level up with the ‘super teams’ in 2025.

Read the full article at ‘We Will Be Even Better than Visma’: Jan Tratnik Sees Big Innovation at Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe on Velo.
author: sstokes
